definition: contrast (balance of black and white in TV screen setup)/degree of contrast
right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple
Belgium/Belgian/abbr. for 比利時|比利时[Bi3 li4 shi2]
to compare/(followed by a noun and adjective) more {adj.} than {noun}/ratio/to gesture/(Taiwan pr. [bi4] in some compounds derived from Classical Chinese)
to pass/to spend (time)/measure/limit/extent/degree of intensity/degree (angles, temperature etc)/kilowatt-hour/classifier for events and occurrences

sentences.english: Line-array fiber-optic image bundles on the contrast transfer function;
sentences.chinese: 本文研究了線列光纖傳像束的對比度調製傳遞函數。

sentences.english: The image in this article has been cropped and enhanced to improve contrast.
sentences.chinese: 文章中的圖像已經被裁剪並且增強以提高對比度。

sentences.english: And the paper introduces the particular process of multi-scale contrast modulation.
sentences.chinese: 同時着重說明了多尺度對比度調製法的具體過程。

sentences.english: The OSD section has three TTL inputs and DC contrast control.
sentences.chinese: OSD的部分有三個TTL輸入和直流對比度控制。

sentences.english: Our blue sensitive, half speed film offers fine grain and high contrast.
sentences.chinese: 我們的感藍半速膠片提供了優良的晶粒和高對比度。

sentences.english: Ironbow, blue-red, high contrast, grey Ironbow.
The contrast threshold below which pixels will not have bokeh artifacts applied.
sentences.chinese: 對比度閾值，小於該值的像素將不產生散景效果。

sentences.english: The image has been cropped and enhanced to improve contrast.
sentences.chinese: 圖像經過剪裁和進行增強處理來提高對比度。

sentences.english: The contrast of the computer screen is too low, please adjust it.
sentences.chinese: 顯示器的對比度太低了，請調高一些吧。

sentences.english: Pattern of the bold and unconstrained clear and contrast for domestic rare.
sentences.chinese: 圖案的豪放清晰和對比度爲國內罕見。

sentences.english: A new technique is proposed to enhance low-contrast images.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一種對低對比度圖像進行增強處理的新技術。

sentences.english: But agree in advance what the comps are and what the multiples are.
sentences.chinese: 但需要提前在對比度和倍數上達成一致。

sentences.english: Color fog images are processed to restore contrast.
sentences.chinese: 對霧天彩色圖像進行對比度增強處理。

sentences.english: Many users require specific high-contrast combinations, such as white text on a black background.
sentences.chinese: 許多用戶都需要特定的高對比度組合，如黑底白字。

sentences.english: Perceived strength of illusion was also measured in grids at suprathreshold contrast levels.
sentences.chinese: 感知強度幻想也衡量電網在閾上的對比度級別。

sentences.english: Sanded suede upper with moc toe and contrast stitching for added style.
sentences.chinese: 磨毛麂皮鞋面商務部腳趾和對比度增加風格的拼接。

definition: (of a garment) designed to be put on by pulling it over one's head (like a sweater or T-shirt etc)
